name: ArcStone Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an enterprise platform designed to accelerate the digitization of the global manufacturing supply chain. The company's platform focuses on operationalizing streams of data to bring about visibility, control, and improvements, enabling enterprise buyers to review and optimize processes across their entire supply chain in real-time, from their top suppliers.
one_liner: Developer of an enterprise platform designed to accelerate the digitization of the global manufacturing supply chain. The company's platform focuses on operationalizing streams of data to bring about visibility, control, and improvements, enabling enterprise buyers to review and optimize processes across their entire supply chain in real-time, from their top suppliers.
